ygData.subject: New monk questions.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Fellow Monks, This is my first time as a monk and I have several questions.  Any help would be great appreciated. 1. I know that will less weight we have
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Fellow Monks,
This is my first time as a monk and I have several questions. Any help would be great appreciated.

1. I know that will less weight we have a higher AC. But where is the balance of weigh and armor. Am I better off with all Leather because of its higher AC or and I better off with all cloth because of its lower weight?

2. When I am ready to upgrade armor from either cloth or leather armor, depending on the answers I get for number 1, what should I get? I know there is netted, mesh, and woven but what is best to get first? What are the advantages of each?

3. When I am ready where is the best place to get magic gloves?

4. When I hit level 17 and get feign death how many points should I put into it? Should I just put one and then start it and sit there till it maxes or won't that work?

5. What am I forgetting about? What is important for me to remember or keep held back for later? Should I save all my practice points for one thing? Etc...

Thanks
Mark
Blades-By-Reedo

Amazing $14,000 Opportunity. Click below for details.
http://www.24689.com
